template_plugin(func)[source]

Decorator that ensures plugin classes are dataclasses.

Parameters:

cls – Class to decorate as plugin.

Returns:

The decorated class.

Raises:

TypeError – If class is not a dataclass.

class PluginConfig(name, version='1.0.0', description='', enabled=True, plugin_data=<factory>)[source]

Bases: object

Base configuration class for plugins.

Parameters:

  • name (str)

  • version (str)

  • description (str)

  • enabled (bool)

  • plugin_data (Dict[str, Any])

name

Plugin name.

version

Plugin version string.

description

Plugin description.

enabled

Whether plugin is active.

plugin_data

Additional plugin-specific data.

name: str
version: str = '1.0.0'
description: str = ''
enabled: bool = True
plugin_data: Dict[str, Any]

Plugin Registry & Loader

class PluginRegistry[source]

Bases: object

Registry for plugin management with auto-loading capability.

_plugins

Dictionary mapping plugin names to plugin classes.

_auto_loaded

Flag indicating if auto-loading has been performed.

_plugins: Dict[str, Type[BaseFilterPlugin]] = {'custom_size': <class 'imagewalker.plugins.custom_filters.custom_size_plugin.CustomSizePlugin'>, 'date_range': <class 'imagewalker.plugins.custom_filters.date_range_plugin.DateRangePlugin'>, 'file_type': <class 'imagewalker.plugins.custom_filters.file_type_plugin.FileTypePlugin'>}
_auto_loaded = False
classmethod auto_load_plugins()[source]

Automatically loads all plugins from standard directories.

classmethod register(name=None)[source]

Decorator for registering plugin classes.

Parameters:

name (str) – Optional custom name for the plugin.

Returns:

Decorator function.

classmethod get_plugin(name)[source]

Retrieves plugin class by name.

Parameters:

name (str) – Name of the plugin to retrieve.

Return type:

Type[BaseFilterPlugin]

Returns:

Plugin class if found, None otherwise.

classmethod get_available_plugins()[source]

Returns list of all registered plugin names.

Return type:

List[str]

Returns:

List of available plugin names.

classmethod create_plugin_instance(name)[source]

Creates an instance of a plugin.

Parameters:

name (str) – Name of the plugin to instantiate.

Returns:

Plugin instance if successful, None otherwise.

classmethod manually_load_plugin(module_path)[source]

Manually loads a plugin from a specific module path.

Parameters:

module_path (str) – File path to the plugin module.

classmethod clear_registry()[source]

Clears the plugin registry (primarily for testing).

class PluginAutoLoader[source]

Bases: object

Automatically loads plugins from specified directories and packages.

classmethod load_plugins_from_directory(directory_path)[source]

Loads all plugins from a filesystem directory.

Parameters:

directory_path (str | Path) – Path to directory containing plugins.

Returns:

List of loaded plugin module names.

classmethod load_plugins_from_package(package_name)[source]

Loads all plugins from a Python package.

Parameters:

package_name (str) – Name of Python package containing plugins.

Returns:

List of loaded plugin module names.

File Type Plugin

class FileTypeConfig(name, version='1.0.0', description='', enabled=True, plugin_data=<factory>, group_images=True, group_videos=True, group_audio=True, group_documents=True)[source]

Bases: PluginConfig

Configuration for file type grouping plugin.

Parameters:

  • name (str)

  • version (str)

  • description (str)

  • enabled (bool)

  • plugin_data (Dict[str, Any])

  • group_images (bool)

  • group_videos (bool)

  • group_audio (bool)

  • group_documents (bool)

group_images

Whether to group image files.

group_videos

Whether to group video files.

group_audio

Whether to group audio files.

group_documents

Whether to group document files.

group_images: bool = True
group_videos: bool = True
group_audio: bool = True
group_documents: bool = True

Size unit (‘KB’, ‘MB’, ‘GB’).

custom_step
